Starring in this film are Lynn Redgrave, Natasha Richardson, Ralph Fiennes, Vanessa Redgrave. This film received positive reviews and is considered an excellent historical drama.
Overall, "The White Countess" directed by Tony Scofield offers a fascinating exploration of love, war, politics, and culture during World War II.
